players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is mafia. We must vote her out today."
You: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night - he's the mafia. Diana must be trying to protect him."
You: "Diana is clearly the mafia trying to frame me. I investigated Bob and he's innocent. Vote Diana to save the town."
Bob: "I am innocent and have been framed by Alice. I suggest we investigate Diana instead."
Diana: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and confirmed she is mafia. Bob is innocent. Vote Alice to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
